refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The first argument specifies the type of the filter to load and can be one of the following: 'pre', 'post', or 'output'. The second argument specifies the name of the filter plugin, for example, 'trim'.

example.title: loading filter plugins
example.programlisting:
<?php

// load prefilter named 'trim'
$smarty->load_filter('pre', 'trim');

// load another prefilter named 'datefooter'
$smarty->load_filter('pre', 'datefooter');

// load output filter named 'compress'
$smarty->load_filter('output', 'compress');

?>

refsect1.para: See also register_prefilter(), register_postfilter(), register_outputfilter() and Advanced features.
